question: Which of the following is also known as the "Bohemian Reformation"?
explanation: Bohemian Reformation is also known as the Czech Reformation or Hussite Reformation. It was a Christian movement of the late medieval and early modern kingdom and Crown of Bohemia (present the whole Czech Republic and Silesia and Lusatia provinces of Poland and Germany) to reform the Roman Catholic Church. It proceeds the protestant Reformation of the 16th century.
